attributes.action: Compensate all those who have had personal details lost through government blunders such as the two cd's and post office account letters going to total strangers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we all have to suffer because again our government,have lost vital data about our families and private details that should be for our eyes only. When you get a letter through the door you expect it to have your name on it not somebody else's, and i think the government should in some way compensate the people for their actions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
